animeTitle: Magia Record: Mahou Shoujo Madoka☆Magica Gaiden
animeDescription: The new heroine of Magia Record is Iroha, a magical girl on the hunt for her missing sister Ui in Kamihama. Also in Kamihama is Madoka, who's searching for the similarly-missing Homura.(Source: Crunchyroll)
animeRelated: ['Adaptation: Mahou Shoujo Kazumi★Magica: The Innocent Malice', 'Alternative version: Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica']
